items.title: This Incredible Book Unexpectedly Rewired My Brain
items.description: You wouldn't think I'd be the intended audience for a book about the UK’s vanishing crafts, but this book rewired my brain in the best way.

items.title: Chef’s Kiss: The Best Foods and Meals in Comics
items.description: From tteokbokki and melon bread to strawberry shortcake and mushroom ricotta tarts, these are some of the best foods in comics.

items.title: Talk About Steamy: 3 Steampunk Romance Books
items.description: These steampunk romances are swoony love stories with a dash of magic and plenty of steam - steam technology and the other kind, too!

items.title: Read Harder With These Great Books Under 250 Pages
items.description: Finish off a few more 2025 Read Harder Challenge tasks before the end of the year with these book recommendations that are under 250 pages.

items.title: 4 Great Books about Building for Kids Who Want to Create (and the Teachers Who Want to Inspire Them)
items.description: These books about building for kids will encourage young readers to create, and introduce them to problem-solving, architecture, and design.
